alert.note: Alert for Camp; Franklin; Morris; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:21AM CDT until June 13 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Central Morris County in northeastern Texas... Titus County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Camp County in northeastern Texas... * Until noon CDT. * At 1121 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Vernon, or 7 miles southwest of Hagansport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Hagansport, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, Naples, Omaha, Cason, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Cookville, Winfield, Miller`s Cove, Rocky Mound, Hopewell, Monticello, Roeder and Harvard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
